mapper.select: select * from gpsdata where month(regdate)=month(now()) and year(regdate)=year(now()) and week(regdate)=week(now()) order by regdate desc
select * from dailywalk where month(regdate)=month(now()) and year(regdate)=year(now()) order by distance desc
mapper.insert: insert into dailywalk (dailywalk_idx, member_idx, distance, regdate) values (#{dailywalk_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{distance}, #{regdate})
mapper.delete: delete from dailywalk where member_idx=#{member_idx} and regdate=#{regdate}
